hotels.title: Central Porto Alegre Escape with Onsite Dining & Swimming Pool
hotels.description: Nestled in the elegant Três Figueiras neighbourhood, Novotel Porto Alegre Três Figueiras offers a comfortable and convenient base for both business and leisure. With stylish, modern rooms and a relaxing outdoor pool, recharge after a busy day exploring the city. Families are well looked after too, with a dedicated Kids' Club. Close to gourmet restaurants, and a short drive from Porto Alegre’s city centre and Airport Porto Alegre-Salgado Filho International Airport, Novotel Porto Alegre Três Figueiras is the ultimate launchpad to the best of Porto Alegre and beyond. Back at the hotel, enjoy refreshing cocktails at BAR 365 or international cuisine, pizzas and live music at RESTAURANTE 365.
